boardgame.description: From the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ready the Cannon, Fix Bayonets, and Prepare to Charge!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Civil War is now upon us, and you must take the field as the leader of the Union or the Confederate forces. Command your generals and direct your infantry, cavalry, and artillery in 30 different scenarios that feature the terrain and troop deployment of each historical battle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;from the First Bull Run and Wilson_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Creek to Prairie Grove and Gettysburg._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;History may have been written, but in Battle Cry, the outcome of each battle is up to you. With your strategy and tactics, you can turn the tide to carry Old Glory or Dixie to victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Includes 30 Battle Scenarios!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is an expanded and updated version of Battle Cry._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Brand new in shrink wrap. Ships TODAY!!! From 1861 to 1865, the United States was at war with itself.Â The battles of the American Civil War have taken a place in the fabric of American history.Â here is your chance to recreate 15 of those Civil War Battles, so get the game today and repeat the history as it happened. I will ship immediately and will ship worldwide. DISCOUNT OFFER_____________________________________________ Buy ANY 2 games from me --_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; get $ 4 discount. Wizards of the Coast (WOC282950000) Ready the Cannon, Fix Bayonets, and Prepare to Charge! Civil War is now upon us, and you must take the field as the leader of the Union or the Confederate forces. Command your generals and direct your infantry, cavalry, and artillery in 30 different scenarios that feature the terrain and troop deployment of each historical battle-from the First Bull Run and Wilson_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Creek to Prairie Grove and Gettysburg. History may have been written, but in Battle Cry, the outcome of each battle is up to you. With your strategy and tactics, you can turn the tide to carry Old Glory or Dixie to victory. Includes 30 Battle Scenarios! This is an expanded and updated version of Battle Cry.

Hi, got this game to replace my 2000 first version of Battle Cry, which I lost in a move. You guess it, when the newer one arrived, I had found the older version of it. So I stored it, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;, played the extra scenarios the newer version comes with, by getting them off the internet. This is a great game, the first one to come out with Borg_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Command _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Colors system in it. This game new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; unopened(still wrapped) is getting harder _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; harder to get, this game has 3 dings in the back corners, but, still quite playable, all sales final, AS IS. P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H via Parcel Post USPS is flat $20.00 only in lower 48 states, V.I., _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; P.R., thanks!

Game condition is completely playable but has some issues which downgraded it to Like New to Very Good/Good: 1. The box is completely fine except there are some light scratches on the front that didnt really tear the image of the box but it does have scratch imprints left behind (noticeable if you look at it at a well-lit angle) 2. The stickers for this game are worthless since they never stick to the figures at all. I barely stickered them but the 2 stickers that I used, and those are the only ones I ever used, are loose and not sure how to put them back together again. I didnt bother to use the rest of the stickers since the figures are already distinguishable by color and shape anyway. To be clear this game is playable and pretty much all of the components look pretty darn good (I played this only 3 times) and none of its faults have really nothing to do with game play at all but this copy has some inconsistencies that might turn off buyers. Buyer pays shipping. Local pickup from 90706 is negotiable. Offers are welcome.

This is in excellent condition, though the box has a little wear and the rulebook is a little folded over in the middle, though not creased - a heavy book will likely flatten it. Domestic shipping - $15, shipping to Canada is $75 and other international shipping is $100. Shipping combined on multiple items at +$1 per item.
New in shrink.

Battle Cry: 150th Civil War Anniversary Edition (2010) Game is new in factory shrink. Shrink has multiple small splits with box scuffing and damage on corners (see pictures). Biggest split roughly three inches on box lid (no box scuffing in this area). Box lid creased in upper left corner (see last picture). Postage is a flat rate $18.00 via USPS Priority Mail. I will combine shipping for multiple items purchased whenever possible. For payment, I accept Paypal, USPS money orders, and cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks drawn on major U.S. banks.
Punched and played.

Game was played twice, then the kids lost interest. Game is complete and in very fine shape. Minor ding on box front (box is structurally sound). Flags stickers were applied but some are coming loose and need to be pressed back in to place. Otherwise a fine game.
Unplayed and mostly unpunched except for a few tiles.
in original shrink
